'''"String, Feather, Trajectory"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "String, Feather, Trajectory" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] after defeating a [[Ruin Destroyer]] in [[Wadi Al-Majuj]].
